name: Skelta Software
overview: Skelta Software Pvt. Ltd., a software product company, specializes in enterprise-wide business process management (BPM) and workflow solutions for small to large-sized businesses in India and internationally. It offers Skelta BPM.NET that provides the business users with the ability to create a new application. The companyâ€™s Skelta BPM.NET is a solution for BPM requirements to enterprise users, information workers, business managers, OEMs/ISVs, and developers. It offers SharePoint Accelerator, a full service BPM solution, which integrates Microsoft SharePoint with the business processes; and Skelta DMS, an electronic document management solution for paperless processes that transforms the document-based processes. The company also provides professional services, including application development, application integration, and customization; implementation services, such as developer, onsite developer, and in-house developer support; maintenance plans, including software updates and software upgrades; and product training, such as onsite, online, and offshore training. It serves aerospace and defense, automotive, consumer goods, energy, finance, healthcare, supply chain, and government industries. Skelta Software Pvt., Ltd. was formerly known as NetGalactic Portal Solutions Private Limited and changed its name to Skelta Software Pvt., Ltd. in 2004. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Bangalore, India. As of April 21, 2010, Skelta Software Pvt. Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Invensys plc.

relationships.title: Head, Knowledge Management, Product Manager Skelta

funding_rounds.source_description: Skelta Software raises first round from SIDBI Venture Capital Ltd.
